comments.body: NB: This is subtle but works.  I had to look it up :)  Because configDir2 gets rewritten below, we are relying on the fact that defer will capture the referenced variables. https://play.golang.org/p/5cBaEM9wgJ

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +230,234 @@
	configDir2, _ := ioutil.TempDir("", "")
	defer os.RemoveAll(configDir2)
	configDir2, _ = ioutil.TempDir(configDir2, "")
	configFile2 := path.Join(configDir2, ".kubeconfig")
